name: I Misteri di Maggia
description: Released in 2004, "I Misteri di Maggia" is an exciting point and click adventure game in first-person set in the small village of Maggia (Ticino, Switzerland)
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: CPU 866Mhz Memory: 64 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 Storage: 485 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit Additional Notes: The game requires "Adventure Maker Runtime System Files". The installation is automatic and must be completed in order to play the game.
